segments.text: Would you like to order anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm good . All we need now is our check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our waitress has been kind of scarce tonight , hasn't she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that is our waitress is over by the bar . Boy , the service has not been good this evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She doesn't appear to be headed this way , so I will go get the check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Just bring it back and we'll total it together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think would be the right amount to tip ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I kind of don't want to leave any tip for the lousy service we received .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree that it was bad service , but I heard one of the other waiters mentioning that it was our server's first night on the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe that 10 % is just about right amount .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that a tip of $ 3.60 will be the right amount to leave .
segments.speaker: S2
